questions.truth: Have you ever pretended to be sick to avoid a video call or online meeting?
questions.dare: Send a voice message to one of your friends singing a silly song.

questions.truth: What is the most embarrassing thing you've done on a video call?
questions.dare: Take a funny selfie and set it as your profile picture for the rest of the game.

questions.truth: Have you ever accidentally sent a text to the wrong person while chatting online?
questions.dare: Perform a 30-second dance routine and record it to share with the group.

questions.truth: What is the funniest autocorrect fail you've experienced while texting?
questions.dare: Send a message to a friend using only emojis and see if they can guess what you're saying.

questions.truth: Have you ever laughed so hard during an online conversation that you snorted or spit out a drink?
questions.dare: Change your online profile picture to a funny animal for the next 24 hours.

questions.truth: What is the most embarrassing thing you've accidentally shared on social media?
questions.dare: Do a dramatic reading of a famous movie quote and share the video with the group.

questions.truth: Have you ever had an embarrassing moment during an online game or video call?
questions.dare: Tell a funny joke in the group chat and make everyone laugh.

questions.truth: What is the most awkward video call or online meeting you've ever been a part of?
questions.dare: Record a video of yourself doing an impression of a famous person and share it with the group.

questions.truth: Have you ever accidentally sent a voice message to the wrong person?
questions.dare: Take a screenshot of your current screen and send it to the group without any explanation.

questions.truth: What is the weirdest online purchase you've ever made?
questions.dare: Perform an impromptu karaoke performance and share the video with the group.

questions.truth: Have you ever stalked someone's social media profile without them knowing?
questions.dare: Change your online status or bio to a funny or random phrase for the next 24 hours.

questions.truth: What is the most embarrassing thing that has happened to you during an online class or webinar?
questions.dare: Take a funny picture of yourself and use it as your virtual background for the next video call.

questions.truth: Have you ever accidentally liked an old post while stalking someone's social media?
questions.dare: Send a random GIF or meme to a friend and ask them to interpret it.

questions.truth: What is the silliest filter or effect you've used during a video call?
questions.dare: Make a short video of yourself doing a magic trick and share it with the group.

questions.truth: Have you ever accidentally left your microphone or camera on during an awkward moment?
questions.dare: Do a virtual tour of your room and show the group your favorite or most interesting item.
